metadata.name: Asymmetry - The Lesson
metadata.description: "Asymmetry - The Lesson" is a powerful and evocative piece that marks the culmination of a set of studies that represent a significant journey in my creative development. This work explores the intricate balance between form, depth, and perception, and reflects on how I perceive and navigate life's challenges. Created using a combination of procedural generative design techniques (Houdini) and Photoshop, the piece is based on the movements of Arabidopsis root growth and is intended to be explored by the viewer. At first glance, the work may appear chaotic, but upon closer inspection, one can find stability and a sense of comfort. I've spent my lifetime exploring the balance and understanding of life's unpredictable challenges, and this work serves as a reflection of the lessons learned and the journey taken.
